(Simplified: 殚)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 單 indicates the sound; 歹 (death) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 歹 [ dǎi ] corpse; death; evil, depraved, wicked
    • 單 [ dān ] single, individual, only; lone
①竭盡：殫心。殫力。殫竭。殫精竭慮。殫見洽聞(指見聞廣博)。
殫心 [ dān xīn ]: to devote one's entire mind
殫精竭慮 [ dān jīng jié lǜ ]: to exhaust one's thoughts and ingenuity (idiom); to think sth through thoroughly; to rack one's brains; to leave no stone unturned
殫力 [ dān lì ]: to strive; endeavor
殫悶 [ dān mèn ]: to faint; to swoon; to lose consciousness
殫殘 [ dān cán ]: to destroy
(Simplified: 殚)

Pictophonetic: 單 indicates the sound; 歹 (death) conveys the meaning.

殫字的基本解释

殫
dān
见“殚”。

殫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dān］
［《廣韻》都寒切，平寒，端。］
亦作“撣6”。“殚1”的繁体字。
(1)尽，竭尽。
(2)通“憚”。畏惧。
(3)通“癉”。病；祸。

殫字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【歹字部】　殫； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页583第30
【唐韻】都寒切【集韻】【韻會】多寒切，?音單。【說文】殛盡也。【班固·西都賦】百獸駭殫。　又凡盡皆曰殫。【司馬相如·子虛賦】殫覩人物之變態。【張衡·西京賦】殫所未見。　通作單。【詩·周頌】單厥心。【禮·祭義】歲旣單矣。皆與殫同。　又【韻補】叶都懸切，音顚。【張衡·東京賦】祈福乎上?，思所以爲虔。肅肅之儀盡，穆穆之禮殫。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dān］
["Guangyun" are all cold cut, flat cold, end. ]
Also known as "Shan 6". "殚1" in traditional characters.
(1) Exhausted, exhausted.
(2) Through "sorrow". fear.
(3) Through "瘅". Sickness; curse.

[Tang Yun] All Han Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] More Han Qi,? Sound list. [Said the text] It's all gone. 【Bangu·Xidu Fu】All the beasts are horrified.　Everything is said to be all. 【Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu】The metamorphosis of the character. Both are the same as Chan.　[Rhyme Supplement] Ye Du hangs and cuts, and the sound is 顚. [Zhang Heng·Tokyo Fu] Pray for blessings, so thinking is pious.
